room_description: Luxury suite with stunning ocean views, elegantly furnished with a king-sized bed, private balcony, and modern amenities. Perfect for relaxation and enjoying beautiful sunsets. Includes complimentary breakfast and evening turndown service.

Standard double room offering a serene garden view, with comfortable furnishings, a spacious bathroom, and all essential amenities. Ideal for couples seeking a peaceful getaway. Enjoy a cup of tea on the terrace.

Executive suite with a breathtaking city view, featuring a plush king-sized bed, luxurious bathroom, and a comfortable sitting area. Perfect for business travelers or a romantic escape. Includes a complimentary city tour.
special_offers: 10% discount for stays longer than 3 nights

room_description: Spacious family suite with direct garden access, offering two bedrooms, a living area, and modern amenities. Ideal for families seeking comfort and convenience. Kids will love the outdoor play area and garden.

Deluxe single room perfect for solo travelers, featuring a cozy bed, a private bathroom, and essential amenities. Enjoy a peaceful stay with access to the villa's beautiful garden and free airport shuttle service.

Penthouse suite with a private terrace offering panoramic views, a spacious living area, a luxurious bathroom, and a king-sized bed. Ideal for luxury seekers. Enjoy exclusive access to the rooftop lounge.

Budget single room with all essential amenities, featuring a comfortable bed, a private bathroom, and free Wi-Fi. Perfect for budget-conscious travelers. Take advantage of the 50% off weekday offer for extra savings.
Luxurious king suite with a private jacuzzi, a spacious living area, and modern amenities. Ideal for those seeking ultimate comfort and luxury. Enjoy a complimentary bottle of champagne on arrival.

Cozy twin room designed for comfort, featuring two comfortable beds, a private bathroom, and essential amenities. Ideal for friends traveling together. Enjoy a peaceful stay with easy access to local attractions.
